name: teleportArrival1
text:
Edgard: Thanks...Uh, where is she?
Nancy:Your grandmother will be here soon. But please,

name: teleportArrival2
text:
Edgard: So this is the room where I'll be staying.
Hard to believe it once belonged to dad.
Well, I'm going to check if grandmother needs something.

name: teleportNight1
text: Edgard: I guess it won't be a problem if I explore the house at night.

name: teleportKitchenFakeFadeOut
text:
//GAMBS PARA FAZER FADE IN/FADE OUT - TELEPORTE PRO MESMO LUGAR Edgard: That was delicious!
Grandma: I am glad you enjoyed, sweetie!.
